fields.label: Taxpayer/Corporate Name
fields.summary: Enter the name of the taxpayer or corporation.

fields.label: Trade Name/Franchise (if applicable)
fields.summary: Enter the trade name or franchise.

fields.label: DTI TRN or BNN/SEC or CDA Registration Number
NEW
fields.summary: Tick if this is a new application.

fields.label: RENEWAL
fields.summary: Tick if this is a renewal.

fields.label: TRANSFER
fields.summary: Tick if this is a transfer.

fields.label: AMENDMENT
fields.summary: Tick if this is an amendment.

fields.label: Change Name
fields.summary: Indicate if there is a change of name.

fields.label: Additional Line of Business
fields.summary: Specify any additional line of business.

fields.label: Floor Area (sq.m)
fields.summary: Enter the floor area in square meters.

fields.label: Do you have tax incentives from any Government Entity?
If Yes (Please select applicable tax incentive/s and attach a copy of your certificate)
If PEZA, type of incentive:
fields.summary: Specify the type of PEZA incentive.

fields.label: Number or employees residing in Taguig
fields.summary: Enter the number of employees in Taguig.

fields.label: Number or employees in establishment
fields.summary: Enter the total number of employees.

fields.label: If Yes, PIN or TD Number:
fields.summary: Provide the PIN or TD number.

fields.label: NATURE OF BUSINESS
fields.summary: Describe the nature of the business.

fields.label: SURNAME
fields.summary: Enter the surname of the authorized representative.

fields.label: Position
fields.summary: Enter the position of the representative.

fields.label: Signature of the Proprietor/Representative over printed name
